description: The street address of the prescription delivery address. This is used by Willow Ambulatory work requests to determine where prescriptions should be delivered.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the work request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DELIVERY_ST_ADDR
columns.description: The street address for the delivery method.
